{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3328544,"name":"","username":"Daria_C","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/d/90ced4/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-03-09T16:48:16.720Z","cooked":"

We are trying to run PathPlanner for our Autos, however, every time we run an auto, it changes the direction the robot goes.

Also, we have to set the beginning pose to 0,0 on the graphical interface.

We think it is a problem with how the pose is being set/ reset.

Here is our code for reference: GitHub - OCHS-STEM-Club/2024-BoomBox at Limelight
